sense.gloss: cum (e.g. bedroom-cum-study), and (concurrently; e.g. chauffeur and secretary), in addition to, at the same time
perusing as a side business, doing in addition to one's main work, running (businesses) simultaneously
side business, job on the side
serving concurrently as, holding the additional post of
serving concurrently as, holding the additional post of
additional post
multi-use, combined use, combination, serving two purposes
constraint, reserve, feeling hesitant, being afraid of troubling someone
equilibrium, good balance, poise
to be unable to, to find difficult (unpleasant, awkward, painful) to do
to serve two or more functions or roles simultaneously, to contain (or combine) two or more features
to work in two or more jobs simultaneously (positions, etc.), to do alongside
to hesitate to do something (out of consideration for others)
to think of the future (as well as the present)
to have both, to possess both, to combine with
operating or carrying on simultaneously
part-time farmer
holding another position, serving concurrently as
concurrent position
promise, prediction
to be unable to endure, to be unable to stand (something), to lose patience
living room and bedroom, bed-sitter
to combine with, to serve as both, to hold an additional post, to use with
to serve at the same time
carrying on a second line of work
holding of concurrent (official) posts, concurrent post
additional post
doing simultaneously
studying two subjects together (e.g. as a major and a minor)
serving concurrently as, holding the additional post of
combined use, combination, dual-use, serving two purposes
filling two positions
subject for a poem (announced prior to a meeting of poets)
being proficient in both, combine both
uniting, unity
carrying on a second line of work
(a woman) being gifted with both intelligence and beauty
capable of anything, liable to do

sdata.j: ちょっと↑大↑↓おお↓きいけど、この↑封筒↑↓ふうとう↓でいいや。↑大↑↓たい↓は↑小↑↓しょう↓を↑兼↑↓か↓ねるって↑言↑↓い↓うし。
sdata.e: It might be a bit big but this envelope will do just fine. It's better to be too big than too small.

sdata.j: この↑書斎↑↓しょさい↓は↑客間↑↓きゃくま↓↑兼用↑↓けんよう↓だ。
sdata.e: I also use this study for receiving guests.

sdata.j: この↑雑誌↑↓ざっし↓の↑編集↑↓へんしゅう↓↑者↑↓しゃ↓↑兼↑↓けん↓↑出版↑↓しゅっぱん↓↑社↑↓しゃ↓が↑一部↑↓いちぶ↓の↑読者↑↓どくしゃ↓から↑批判↑↓ひはん↓された。
sdata.e: The editor and publisher of this magazine was criticized by some readers.

sdata.j: ↑兼子↑↓かねこ↓は↑新↑↓あたら↓しい↑仕事↑↓しごと↓で↑非常↑↓ひじょう↓に↑緊張↑↓きんちょう↓して、↑神経↑↓しんけい↓↑衰弱↑↓すいじゃく↓にかかってしまった。
sdata.e: Kaneko was so stressed out at her new job that she had a nervous breakdown.

sdata.j: ↑才色兼備↑↓さいしょくけんび↓だ。
sdata.e: She is as wise as fair.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓は↑勉強↑↓べんきょう↓と↑遊↑↓あそ↓びを↑兼↑↓か↓ねている↑仕事↑↓しごと↓につきたい。
sdata.e: I want to get a job that mixes work and play.

sdata.j: ↑昼夜↑↓ちゅうや↓↑兼行↑↓けんこう↓で↑働↑↓はたら↓くと↑身体↑↓しんたい↓を↑壊↑↓こわ↓すよ。
sdata.e: If you work day and night, you will lose your health.

sdata.j: ↑彼↑↓かれ↓は↑小説↑↓しょうせつ↓↑家↑↓か↓↑兼↑↓けん↓↑画家↑↓がか↓である。
sdata.e: He is a novelist and artist.

sdata.j: ↑彼女↑↓かのじょ↓は↑才色兼備↑↓さいしょくけんび↓だ。
sdata.e: She is as clever as she is beautiful.

sdata.j: ↑編集↑↓へんしゅう↓↑者↑↓しゃ↓↑兼↑↓けん↓↑出版↑↓しゅっぱん↓↑者↑↓しゃ↓であるその↑人↑↓ひと↓は↑私↑↓わたし↓のいとこです。
sdata.e: The editor and publisher is my cousin.

sdata.j: ↑今日↑↓きょう↓は、ばーさんのお↑使↑↓つか↓いを↑兼↑↓か↓ねて↑街↑↓まち↓で↑買↑↓か↓い↑物↑↓もの↓。
sdata.e: Today I'm shopping in town as well as running an errand for my grandmother.

sdata.j: ↑私↑↓わたし↓↑達↑↓たち↓は↑時々↑↓ときどき↓、ドライブを↑兼↑↓か↓ねて↑大好↑↓だいす↓きなラーメンを↑食↑↓た↓べに↑行↑↓い↓きます。
sdata.e: We sometimes combine going for a drive with eating the ramen we love so.

sdata.j: その↑本↑↓ほん↓を↑書↑↓か↓いた↑人↑↓ひと↓は、↑機知↑↓きち↓とユーモアを↑兼↑↓か↓ね↑備↑↓そな↓えた↑人↑↓ひと↓だね。
sdata.e: The person who wrote that book is possessed of both humour and wit, isn't he?

sdata.j: トムは↑気兼↑↓きが↓ねすることなく↑自分↑↓じぶん↓の↑意見↑↓いけん↓を↑述↑↓の↓べたことがない。
sdata.e: Tom never felt comfortable expressing his own opinion.

sdata.j: ご↑要望↑↓ようぼう↓にお↑応↑↓こた↓えし↑兼↑↓か↓ねます。
sdata.e: I cannot respond to your request.

sdata.j: このパジャマは、↑男女↑↓だんじょ↓↑兼用↑↓けんよう↓です。
sdata.e: These are unisex pyjamas.

sdata.j: ユリウス・グスタフ・ノイブロナーは、ドイツの↑薬剤師↑↓やくざいし↓↑兼↑↓けん↓↑発明↑↓はつめい↓↑家↑↓か↓でした。
sdata.e: Julius Gustav Neubronner was a German apothecary and inventor.

sdata.j: トムが↑女↑↓おんな↓の↑子↑↓こ↓だったらよかったのに。そしたら↑気兼↑↓きが↓ねなく↑寄↑↓よ↓り↑添↑↓そ↓ってられたのに。
sdata.e: I wish that Tom were a girl. That way I would be able to get close to him without any hesitation.

sdata.j: この↑傘↑↓かさ↓ね、↑晴雨↑↓せいう↓↑兼用↑↓けんよう↓で↑便利↑↓べんり↓なのよ。
sdata.e: This umbrella is convenient to use in both clear and rainy weather.

sdata.j: この↑傘↑↓かさ↓ね、↑晴雨↑↓せいう↓↑兼用↑↓けんよう↓で↑便利↑↓べんり↓なのよ。
sdata.e: This umbrella is useful both in dry and rainy weather.

sdata.j: ホテルは↑現在↑↓げんざい↓、↑地元↑↓じもと↓の↑博物館↑↓はくぶつかん↓↑兼↑↓けん↓コミュニティセンターとなっています。
sdata.e: The hotel has now become a local museum and community center.

sdata.j: テレビとモニタを↑兼用↑↓けんよう↓してる。
sdata.e: I use it as both a television and a monitor.

sdata.j: ↑思↑↓おも↓ったことを↑気兼↑↓きが↓ねなく↑言↑↓い↓っていいんだよ。
sdata.e: Feel free to share your thoughts.

sdata.j: トムは、↑内心↑↓ないしん↓うちの↑母↑↓かあ↓さんなら、やり↑兼↑↓か↓ねないと↑思↑↓おも↓っていた。
sdata.e: Deep down, Tom thought his mother was the type of person who could've done it.

sdata.j: ↑精肉↑↓せいにく↓↑店↑↓てん↓と↑飲食↑↓いんしょく↓↑店↑↓てん↓を↑兼↑↓か↓ねたお↑店↑↓みせ↓だからこそできるこの↑低↑↓てい↓↑価格↑↓かかく↓。↑是非↑↓ぜひ↓、↑一度↑↓いちど↓ご↑賞味↑↓しょうみ↓ください。
sdata.e: Because we're both a butcher's shop and a restaurant, we can offer such low prices. Please have a taste!
